attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the resumption of commercial whaling by such nations as Japan and Iceland, we hereby call upon the UK Government to apply pressure to ban any form of whaling, whether commercial or scientific.

These majestic creatures have inhabited the earth for thousands of years and are being forced into extinction. Surely it is down to us as the human population to save these wonderful creatures from an undeserved fate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
